column1: Table Title: Five Preventable Crime Cases Recorded By Neighbourhood Police Centre (NPC), Annual
Compilation of Five Preventable Crimes (5Ps) by NPC started with effect from 2010.  Figures are based on annual revisions and pertain to cases with known locations.
Ang Mo Kio Police Division - Punggol NPC (Number):
Ang Mo Kio Police Division - Punggol NPC started operation in 2013.  Compilation of 5Ps Cases for Punggol NPC started with effect from 2013.
Ang Mo Kio Police Division - Woodleigh NPC (Number):
Ang Mo Kio Police Division - Woodleigh NPC started operation on 23 Jul 2023.  Compilation of 5Ps Cases for Woodleigh NPC started with effect from 23 Jul 2023.
Bedok Police Division - Bedok North and Bedok South NPC were reorganised into Bedok NPC.  Compilation for Bedok NPC started with effect from Feb 2022.
Jurong Police Division - Woodlands NPC was reorganised into Woodlands East NPC and Woodlands West NPC.  Compilation for both NPCs started with effect from 2012.
Cases at Tuas Checkpoint and Woodlands Checkpoint fall under Nanyang NPC and Woodlands West NPC respectively with effect from 3 Jan 2023.
na   not available or not applicable
-     nil or negligible or not significant
Numbers may not add up to the totals due to rounding.
Data are the latest available at the time of access or download. Some statistics, particularly those for the most recent time periods, are provisional and may be subject to revision at a later date.
Values are shown in Singapore dollars (unless otherwise specified).
